biotools.summary: Java-based application developed to address multiple-testing issue with dependent Single-nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs).  Based on this new measure, several popular multiple-testing methods including Bonferroni, Holm, Simes correction was improved to evaluate significance level of SNP p-values in genome-wide association studies.

bioschemas.name: GEC
bioschemas.summary: Java-based application developed to address multiple-testing issue with dependent Single-nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs).  Based on this new measure, several popular multiple-testing methods including Bonferroni, Holm, Simes correction was improved to evaluate significance level of SNP p-values in genome-wide association studies.
